title.narrative: Sri Lanka Agriculture Sector Modernization Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives (PDO) are to support increasing agriculture productivity, improving market access, and enhancing value addition of smallholder farmers and agribusinesses in the project areas.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Plantation Industries and Export Agriculture

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Agriculture Technology Demonstrations-Project Operations Manual | Description :The Recipient shall adopt, nolater than August 30, 2016, an Agriculture Technology Demonstration-Operations Manual in form and substance satisfactory to theAssociation. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plans | Description :The Recipient shall, throughout Project implementation, furnish to theAssociation for approval as soon as available, but in any case not later than September 30 of each year, an annual work plan andbudget for the Project for each subsequent fiscal year. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Board of Directors | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no later than August 30, 2016 and thereaftermaintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a Board of Directors with composition, qualifications, experience and underterms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Central Bank of Sri Lanka Implementation Responsibility | Description :The Recipient shall cause the CentralBank of Sri Lanka to implement Part 1 (c) of the Project in accordance with the provisions of Partial Credit Guarantee-OperationsManual and the provisions of the Financing Agreement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Central Project Coordination Committee | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no later than August 30,2016, and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a Central Project Coordination Committee. | Due Date:30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Environmental Management Plans and Resettlement Plans | Description :The Recipient shall prepare anEnvironmental Management Plan or Resettlement Action Plan in accordance with the provisions of the Environmental Assessment andManagement Framework or Resettlement Policy Framework, as applicable; furnish to the Association for review and approval; andthereafter adopt and disclose as approved by the Association, in a manner satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Financial Management System | Description :The Recipient shall maintain or cause to be maintained a financialmanagement system in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 of the General Conditions. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Finanical Audit | Description :The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited in accordance with theprovisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. Each audit of the Financial Statements shall cover the period of onefiscal year of the Recipient. The audited Financial Statements for each such period shall be furnished to the Association notlater than six months after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Interim Unaudited Finanical Report | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association notlater than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Projectcovering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :M/o Primary Industries-Central Bank of Sri Lanka Memorandum of Understanding | Description :The Recipient shallcause the Ministry of Primary Industries, no later than August 30, 2016, to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding with theCentral Bank of Sri Lanka in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Matching Grants Operational Manual | Description :The Recipient shall adopt, no later than August 30, 2016, aMatching Grants Operations Manual in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Mid-term Review | Description :The Recipient shall prepare, under terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation, and furnish to the Association by no later than January 15, 2019, a consolidated mid-term review report for theProject. | Due Date :15-Jan-2019

Finance Agreement :Ministry of Agriculture-Project Management Unit | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no later thanAugust 30, 2016, and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a Ministry of Agriculture-Project ManagementUnit. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Ministry of Primary Industries - Project Management Unit | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no laterthan August 30, 2016 and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a Ministry of Primary Industries-ProjectManagement Unit. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Partial Credit Guarantee Operations Manual | Description :The Recipient shall adopt, no later than August 30,2016, a Partial Credit Guarantee-Operations Manual in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016

Finance Agreement :Progress Reports | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepareProject Reports, covering the period of one calendar semester, and shall be furnished to the Association not later than one monthafter the end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Project Coordination Committee | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no later than September 15, 2016,and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, a Coordination Committee with composition and terms ofreference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :15-Sep-2016

Finance Agreement :Provincial Project Management Units | Description :The Recipient shall cause each of the Participating Provincesto establish, no later than September 15, 2016, and maintain throughout the implementation period, a Provincial Project ManagementUnit. | Due Date :15-Sep-2016

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Implementation Monitoring | Description :The Recipient shall take all measures necessary to regularlycollect, compile, and submit to the Association, as part of the Project Reports, information on the status of compliance with theSafeguards Instruments. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Instruments | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that each contract for works under the Projectincludes the obligation of the relevant contractor to comply with the relevant Safeguard Instruments applicable to such civil workscommissioned/awarded pursuant to said contract. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with theprovisions of the Safeguards Instruments. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Technical Review Group | Description :The Recipient shall establish, no later than August 30, 2016, andthereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project a Technical Review Group with composition, qualifications,experience and under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Aug-2016
